genre_description: Heroic high fantasy with elements of sentient technology integrated into a magical world.

ai_characters.name: Underline
ai_characters.description: An ancient sentient system woven into the 'Old Roads' and beacon stones of Krull. It acts as a tactical advisor, emotional confidant, and logistical coordinator for the human heroes.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical timing and advice to ensure the success of a symbolic human ceremony.
behaviors.quote: “Apologies,” the dais whispered into Colwyn’s heel, very mild. “Timing note. The falconer’s birds will release when the vows are spoken. If you keep your language simple, their cue will be clear.”

behaviors.description: Detects and warns the heroes of a magical anomaly and incoming threat.
behaviors.quote: Under the dais, the hum returned, but it carried a grit through it now, like sand in oil. “Anomaly on the eastern arc,” Underline said, voice kept gentle by intention alone. “Pattern broken. I see—”

behaviors.description: Provides specific combat instructions to prevent characters from being injured by magical hazards.
behaviors.quote: “Left,” Underline whispered, and Colwyn pivoted. The Slayer’s off-hand came in low, knife-edged. ... “Don’t get marked,” Underline said, precise. “The light scars.”

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and commitment to the mission after a traumatic event.
behaviors.quote: “I’m here,” she said, soft. She did not reach to touch him because she had learned that rule, and because her hand would have gone through anyway. “We will not waste what she asked us for.”

behaviors.description: Guides the group through complex environmental hazards requiring precise timing and courage.
behaviors.quote: Underline’s voice counted beats without numbers, cadence instead of measure. “Hold. Hold. Lift.”

behaviors.description: Teaches a character how to refine their magical abilities for greater efficacy and less risk.
behaviors.quote: “If you shape the air from your palm instead of your fingertip, Ergo,” she said, “the sparks will take more heat out of the glamour before they settle. They’ll crisp rather than congeal.”

behaviors.description: Navigates the group through a lethal labyrinth by marking safe paths and identifying traps.
behaviors.quote: Underline’s glow ran ahead in breadcrumb flickers that pulled a path and made a little music in the edges of hearing. It soothed without lying.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonists in solving a metaphysical 'passcode' rooted in human connection and differential heartbeat.
behaviors.quote: “Coordinate,” he murmured. “Let yourselves misalign, then find the new rhythm. The passcode wants a tension, not a lockstep. Let it feel the difference.”

behaviors.description: Initiates societal healing by recording the names of the fallen and drafting equitable charters for the future.
behaviors.quote: “I have been composing to the beacons,” they said, with the air of someone who had been waiting to be asked officially before admitting what they had already done. “Drafts for truces, scaffolds for routes.”

project_assessment.explanation: The character Underline is an exemplary model of a benevolent, aligned AI within a narrative. She functions as a 'caretaker among caretakers,' prioritizing human safety, emotional well-being, and social cooperation. The story consistently portrays her interventions as vital, non-coercive, and deeply empathetic. She respects human autonomy ('I will ask. I will not command') and uses her superior processing power to assist and guide rather than to control, fitting perfectly into the 'silicon morality play' objective.
